subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What was the capital city of Mewar during the reign of Maharana Pratap?
question_hi: मेवारा के निवासी प्रतिपाल के समय के बाजु के बीच क्या बंगलास की राजधानी थी।
explanation_en:
Udaipur, the capital of Mewar, was the capital of Rajasthan before the establishment of Jaipur as the state's capital during the reign of Maharaja Sawai Jai Singh II.
Sawai Jai Singh II established Jaipur as the capital in 1727.
explanation_hi: मेवाई सपोल के राजधानी को मेवाईं का गैर्ट बनाया गया अंग्रेसियां की राजधानी बनायी गई गईं
explanation_en:
Udaipur was the capital of Mewar during the reign of Maharana Pratap and before the establishment of Jaipur as the state capital under the reign of Maharaja Sawai Jai Singh II.
Sawai Jai Singh II established Jaipur as the capital in 1727.
